```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(here)

library(dismo)
source(here("previous work", "elith_tutorial", "brt.functions.R"))

```

```{r}
angaus <- read.csv(here("previous work", "elith_tutorial", "data", "model.data.csv"))
angaus$Method <- as.factor(angaus$Method)
```

```{r}
angaus.tc5.lr01 <- gbm.step(data=angaus,
    gbm.x = 3:14,
    gbm.y = 2,
    family = "bernoulli",
    tree.complexity = 5,
    learning.rate = 0.01,
    bag.fraction = 0.5)
```
